name: Troubleshooting Skills
description: A practical and cognitive framework for diagnosing, isolating, and resolving problems across technical, organizational, and human systems.

name: AI as a Force Multiplier for Knowledge Work
Documentation Fundamentals
description: Best practices for creating, organizing, and maintaining system documentation across hardware, software, and integrated systems. Includes modern AI-assisted approaches.

name: Hardware Systems Documentation
description: Practical documentation standards for physical systems: equipment, wiring, installations, and as-built drawings. Covers the documentation that keeps hardware systems maintainable and serviceable.

name: Software Systems Documentation
description: Practical documentation standards for software systems: code, APIs, configurations, deployments, and the documentation that keeps software maintainable over time.

name: Integrated Systems Documentation
description: Documentation practices for systems that combine hardware, software, and networks: AV systems, control systems, building automation, and other integrated technology deployments.

name: Marketing Without a Budget
description: Guerrilla marketing tactics for small operators: unconventional, low-cost strategies that rely on creativity, community, and hustle rather than advertising spend.
